text: Fever Crumb is a novel written by Philip Reeve in 2009. It is a post- apocalyptic science fiction novel, aimed to young adults. ==Awards and recognition== *2010 Shortlist for the Carnegie Medal *2011 American Library Association Notable Children's Book for Older Readers ==References== ==Other websites== *Philip Reeve, Scholastic Ltd. *Book review, The Independent *Book Review, Fantastic Fiction *Fever Crumb Site Category:2009 books Category:Predator Cities Category:British young adult novels Category:Science fiction books
title: Fever Crumb
